recipe.title: Tuna Dip with Lemon and Capers
ingredients: two 6-ounce cans solid white tuna packed in oil, drained well
instructions: In a bowl stir tuna with a fork until finely flaked. In another bowl whisk tofu until smooth. Stir tofu and remaining ingredients into tuna until combined and season with salt and pepper. Serve dip with crackers or crudités.
